headline: Trump Asserts Fed Derailed 4% Growth. Not True, Experts Say.
abstract: In an extreme scenario, the central bank might have lifted growth to around 3 percent, at a hefty cost.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — President Trump has repeatedly blamed the Federal Reserve’s interest rate policy for preventing the American economy from reaching the 4 percent growth he had promised. On Wednesday, Mr. Trump renewed that criticism from the sidelines of an elite gathering in Davos, Switzerland.
